trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lorain
There were no other sightings in Lorain on or around May 23rd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work, when a co-worker called me out to see these blinking lights over the southern sky, they we amber colored but they didn't seem to be typical of a jet. After staring at them for a couple of minutes they went away, a building obstucted our view. We were talking it over when they appeared again and this time they were "headed" west we heard a loud roar,kind of like a jet but after about 2-3 minutes they dissappeared again, they kind of vanished this time nothin was blocing our view.
Summary: Several amber colored lights in the southern sky over Lorain, Ohio
